title: Prime Day Apple Watch deals are gone, but plenty more smartwatches are on offer
author: tom-bedford
article: The Prime Day deals are running out as we write, and we've basically seen the end of the Apple Watch discounts (though peek below for an Apple Watch 3 discount). But if you're looking for a wrist-mounted exercise or lifestyle companions, there are other options, especially ones that work for iOS and Android phones.

We've seen a few great Prime Day smartwatch deals over the course of the discount days, and unlike the Apple Watch ones, they're mostly still live. Some may dwindle as the day goes on, so make your choice now.

We've collected all the great smartwatch deals still live in the US, and listed them below, so you can pick. There are Prime Day deals for products from different top companies, at various price tags, for you to choose from.
(Not in the US? Scroll down for deals in your region).
If you'd rather look at the wider world of smartwatches beyond Apple Watch ones, there are loads of options.
You might opt for one of these smartwatches because of their affordable prices, like the fitness trackers which have seen some discounts - Apple Watches tend to be pretty pricey.

There are lots of Fitbits below, and they're great for their community features. You can see how far your friends and family members have walked each day, for example, though they've got lots of standard smartwatch features too.
Some smartwatches below are from top brands for fitness, too, so if you're an exercise buff there will be devices which are super useful for tracking your workouts.
No matter where you live, you'll find all the lowest prices for smartwatches from around the web right here, with offers available in your region.
